items.sentence: If Tom comes to see me, tell him I'm not at home.
I can't go out because I have to clean the house.
Tom knew that Mary was hiding behind the curtain.
We decided to stay inside because it was raining.
Did you really plan to do this all by yourselves?
You can ask that child that's playing over there.
What kind of flowers does Tom have in his garden?
I want you to pay back the money that you owe me.
Do you want to come to my apartment and hang out?
There was nothing Tom could've done to help Mary.
I don't have the slightest intention of retiring.
If you're busy, I'll ask someone else to help me.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was insane.
At dinner time, don't speak with your mouth full.
I used to play tennis when I was a young student.
I wasn't able to get rid of my doubts about that.
It's a hassle to take the husks off of chestnuts.
A long piece of thread easily becomes tangled up.
A monument was erected in memory of the deceased.
A police car has stopped on the side of the road.
